attributes.action: Freedom of speech for the United Kingdom citizens.
attributes.additional_details:
This will stop biased, one sided and unfair censorship on current topics. This will help keep UK citizens from living in a dictatorship. This will be able to give UK citizens more liberties and freedoms with freedom of speech.
To put an end to dictatorship and censorship with forced ideologies.
attributes.background: To bring freedom of speech to the citizens of the United Kingdom. To stop unbiased discussions of topics and bring fair discussions. To implement freedom to the people of the U.K.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Freedom of Expression is already included in the Human Rights Act

https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1998/42/schedule/1/part/I/chapter/9

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
